程序包 com.umeng.common.ui.activities

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AlbumActivity
    用户相册Activity
    BaseActivity
    Created by wangfei on 16/7/7.
    BaseFragmentActivity
    继承自FragmentActivity的Activity类型, 封装了FragmentManager和去除了title
    BaseTitleActivity
    含有Title的Fragment Activity
    BrowserActivity  
    FindBaseActivity
    Created by wangfei on 16/1/15.
    GuideBaseActivity
    用户首次注册成功并修改用户信息后，将进行话题跟活跃用户的引导
    LoginSimplifyActivity
    Created by wangfei on 16/5/5.
    MessageChatActivity  
    NewMsgBaseActivity  
    RegisterActivity
    Created by wangfei on 16/5/6.
    SearchBaseActivity<T extends FeedListBaseFragment>
    搜索的activity
    SearchTopicBaseActivity<T extends BaseFragment>
    Created by wangfei on 16/1/19.
    SettingActivity
    设置页面 注意：此Activity的名字不能修改，数据层需要回调此Activity
    TopicDetailBaseActivity
    Created by wangfei on 16/1/22.
    UserInfoBaseActivity
    用户个人信息页面, 包含已发布的消息、已关注的话题、已关注的人三个fragment, 以及用户的头像、个人基本信息等.
